    Search P2P

    p2p_search.Rd

    Search P2P

    p2p_search(coin, fiat, side, pay_types = c(), page = NA, rows = 10)

    Arguments

    coin

    Coin.

    fiat

    Fiat currency.

    side

    Side of the trade: "BUY" or "SELL".

    pay_types

    Options for payment. One or more of "BANK", "WECHAT" or "ALIPAY". The default, c(), allows all payment options.

    page

    Page number. If NA then get all pages.

    rows

    Number of records per page.

    Value

    A data frame.

    Examples

    # Grab the first page.
p2p_search("ETH", "USD", side = "BUY", page = 1)
#> # A tibble: 10 × 10
#>    advert_id  side  asset fiat  price available min_amount max_amount advertiser
#>    <chr>      <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl>     <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl> <list>    
#>  1 113327434… BUY   ETH   USD   2663.   0.0194          15       51.7 <tibble>  
#>  2 113330958… BUY   ETH   USD   2722.   0.00997         15       27.1 <tibble>  
#>  3 113330510… BUY   ETH   USD   2730.   0.152           15      415.  <tibble>  
#>  4 112609669… BUY   ETH   USD   2738.   0.344           50      943.  <tibble>  
#>  5 112627973… BUY   ETH   USD   2741.   0.227           11      623.  <tibble>  
#>  6 112822947… BUY   ETH   USD   2742.   2.14           100     2000   <tibble>  
#>  7 113063985… BUY   ETH   USD   2775.   0.369           50     1024.  <tibble>  
#>  8 113003506… BUY   ETH   USD   2788.   0.997           10     2781.  <tibble>  
#>  9 113330642… BUY   ETH   USD   2800    0.0172          15       48.1 <tibble>  
#> 10 112158202… BUY   ETH   USD   2805.   0.0128           5       36.0 <tibble>  
#> # … with 1 more variable: payment <list>
# Grab all pages.
p2p_search("BUSD", "CAD", side = "BUY")
#> # A tibble: 31 × 10
#>    advert_id  side  asset fiat  price available min_amount max_amount advertiser
#>    <chr>      <chr> <chr> <chr> <dbl>     <dbl>      <dbl>      <dbl> <list>    
#>  1 113325749… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.28     1049.        100      1343. <tibble>  
#>  2 113329288… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.28     1474.       1000      1886. <tibble>  
#>  3 113330901… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.28      399.        410       511. <tibble>  
#>  4 113305737… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29     6008.        300      1300  <tibble>  
#>  5 113238900… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29      825.        200      1065. <tibble>  
#>  6 113307610… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29      981.        500      1265. <tibble>  
#>  7 113325313… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29     1247.        200      1608. <tibble>  
#>  8 113295777… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29     6281.       1000      4500  <tibble>  
#>  9 113302182… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29      510.        200       658. <tibble>  
#> 10 113303910… BUY   BUSD  CAD    1.29      619.        150       799. <tibble>  
#> # … with 21 more rows, and 1 more variable: payment <list>
